# üëã Meet Pieces

Welcome to Pieces! Your AI-powered productivity tool that captures, enriches, and reuses useful materials.

## What is Pieces?

Pieces is an AI-powered productivity tool designed to capture, enrich, and reuse useful materials throughout your workflow. Whether you're a developer, designer, or knowledge worker, Pieces helps you save time and stay organized.

## Key Features

- **Smart Capture:** Save code snippets, screenshots, and text with automatic enrichment
- **AI-Powered Search:** Find what you need using natural language queries
- **Cross-Platform Sync:** Access your materials across all your devices
- **IDE Integration:** Seamlessly work with your favorite development tools
- **Team Collaboration:** Share knowledge and resources with your team

## Getting Started

The best way to get started with Pieces is to install the desktop application and explore the fundamentals. From there, you can add integrations and customize your workflow.

/docs/meet-pieces/fundamentals.content:
:::info[Welcome to Pieces Fundamentals]
This guide will walk you through the three core pillars that make Pieces a powerful productivity tool for developers.
:::

## The Three Pillars of Pieces

Pieces powers developers to new levels of productivity through three fundamental features:

<Steps>
<Step number="1" title="Long-Term Memory Engine (LTM-2)">
A powerful "artificial memory" that remembers your workflow and automatically saves context for future use.
</Step>

<Step number="2" title="Pieces Copilot">
AI assistant for day-to-day tasks like debugging code, generating comments, and answering questions‚Äîwith as much or as little workflow context as you need.
</Step>

<Step number="3" title="Pieces Drive">
An intelligent and enriched material management experience that ensures your most important code and useful materials are always at hand.
</Step>
</Steps>

<ExpandableImage src="https://storage.googleapis.com/hashnode_product_documentation_assets/meet_pieces_assets/meet_pieces/fundamentals/ltm-2-header.png" alt="LTM-2 Header - Long-Term Memory Engine" caption="The LTM-2 Engine powers intelligent context retention" />

## LTM-2: Your Workflow Memory

The Long-Term Memory Engine (LTM-2) captures live context from your workflow over a 7-day period, enhancing your ability to recall and access past materials.

<ExpandableImage src="https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1734028488469/d128a760-7e91-4dbf-8cfc-e7fc257488b7.png?auto=compress,format&format=webp&q=75" alt="Pieces Copilot with LTM-2 Context" caption="Pieces Copilot leveraging LTM-2 for contextual assistance" />

:::tip[Pro Tip]
You can ask questions like "Can you provide me with the link to the Firestore database I was working in last week?" or "Summarize the contents of the brief on plugin updates in the Google doc Tim shared" for game-changing productivity enhancement.
:::

### Key LTM-2 Capabilities

- **Contextual Recall**: LTM-2 remembers the websites you visit, the code you work on, and the snippets you save. This context can be accessed via the Pieces Desktop App or within Copilot Chats inside your favorite IDE.
- **Natural Language Queries**: Ask contextual questions about your previous workflow, and LTM-2 will source the relevant anchor and provide you with a clickable URL or path to a file on your device.
- **Integrated Access**: Utilize LTM-2 through the Pieces Desktop App or within your favorite development tools via browser or IDE integrations.

### Workstream Activity

:::info[New Feature]
Pieces for Developers has just launched a new flagship feature called [Workstream Activity](https://docs.pieces.app/products/desktop/workstream-activity).
:::

The Workstream Activity view in the [Pieces Desktop App](https://docs.pieces.app/products/desktop) uses the advanced Long-Term Memory (LTM-2) Engine to collect and summarize your recent tasks, discussions, code reviews, and more.

<ExpandableImage src="https://storage.googleapis.com/hashnode_product_documentation_assets/desktop_app_assets/workstream_activity/new_workstream_activity_media/ltm_rollup_demo_screenshot.png" alt="Workstream Activity in the Pieces Desktop App" caption="Workstream Activity provides intelligent summaries of your development workflow" />

[PiecesOS](https://docs.pieces.app/products/core-dependencies/pieces-os) collects the LTM data and provides a concise roll-up of that data **every 20 minutes**, drastically reducing the repetitive context-setting typical of many AI tools.

:::success[Smart Summaries]
Each roll-up is a snapshot that includes details on main tasks, projects, issues resolved, key decisions, discussions, documents, and code you've reviewed‚Äîoften with helpful links included!
:::

You can also start Pieces Copilot chats with individual roll-ups, eliminating the need to manually enter context.

## Pieces Copilot: Your AI Development Partner

Pieces Copilot leverages advanced Large Language Models (LLMs) to assist you in understanding and generating code, accessible through your IDEs, editors, and the Desktop App.

<ExpandableImage src="https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1734028533289/f37f7075-f2d2-4a99-b948-c23fd70e7257.png?auto=compress,format&format=webp&q=75" alt="Pieces Copilot for Code Generation" caption="Pieces Copilot helping with code generation and explanations" />

### What Copilot Can Do

The Pieces Copilot, accessible via the Pieces Desktop App or any of our IDE or browser integrations, helps with:

- **Understanding Code**: Get explanations of complex code snippets, learn how a particular function works, or explore alternative implementations.
- **Code Generation**: Generate code or code comments based on specific requirements, either from raw prompting or in-environment contextual understanding.
- **LLM Flexibility**: Switch between local models for privacy and speed, or cloud-hosted models for more advanced capabilities.

:::warning[Model Selection]
Choose local models for sensitive code or when working offline. Use cloud models for more complex tasks that require advanced reasoning capabilities.
:::

## Pieces Drive: Intelligent Material Management

Saving and managing code and other materials is effortless and efficient with Pieces Drive.

<ExpandableImage src="https://cdn.hashnode.com/res/hashnode/image/upload/v1734026181487/e947ec50-4346-49f1-a967-62b218aafc47.png?auto=compress,format&format=webp&q=75" alt="Viewing Saved Materials with Pieces Drive" caption="Pieces Drive provides a comprehensive view of all your saved materials" />

The Pieces Drive lets you save important developer resources, like notes, useful code, links, and more to your personal Local Repository‚Äîfrom which you can then view, edit, re-use, and share these materials via Pieces Shareable Links.

:::success[Easy Collaboration]
Intended recipients are not required to have a Pieces account, so cross-platform collaboration is exceptionally easy.
:::

### Integration Ecosystem

With Pieces, you'll find Pieces Drive integrated into your favorite:

- **IDEs and Editors**: Extensions for [VS Code](https://docs.pieces.app/products/extensions-plugins/visual-studio-code), [JetBrains IDEs](https://docs.pieces.app/products/extensions-plugins/jetbrains), [Sublime Text](https://docs.pieces.app/products/extensions-plugins/sublime), and more enable you to save snippets without leaving your coding environment.
- **Web Browsers**: The Pieces Web Extension let you capture code from documentation sites, forums, or any web page using your favorite browsers.
- **Collaboration Tools**: Integrations with tools like [Obsidian](https://docs.pieces.app/products/obsidian) help you save code from notes and shared documents.

## Getting Started

<Steps>
<Step number="1" title="Install Pieces Desktop App">
Download and install the Pieces Desktop App for your operating system to get started with the core functionality.
</Step>

<Step number="2" title="Add Browser Extension">
Install the Pieces Web Extension to start capturing useful code and materials from the web.
</Step>

<Step number="3" title="Install IDE Extensions">
Add Pieces extensions to your favorite IDEs to integrate seamlessly with your development workflow.
</Step>

<Step number="4" title="Explore LTM-2">
Start using Pieces Copilot and experience how LTM-2 enhances your productivity with contextual assistance.
</Step>
</Steps>
